voxatrace/com.musicmuni.voxatrace.calibra/CalibraVocalRange/Builder

Builder

class Builder

Builder for advanced CalibraVocalRange configuration.

Provides fine-grained control over detection parameters:

  • Minimum note duration for stability

  • Confidence thresholds

  • Stability detection window

  • Maximum pitch deviation for "stable" notes

  • Audio sample rate

Example:

val analyzer = CalibraVocalRange.Builder()
    .minNoteDuration(0.5f)  // Faster detection
    .minConfidence(0.6f)    // Higher quality threshold
    .sampleRate(44100)
    .build()

fun minNoteDuration(seconds: Float): CalibraVocalRange.Builder

Set minimum duration for a note to be considered stable. Based on ASHA 2018 guidelines (default: 1.0 second).
